info.institution: Data Mining and Machine Learning group, Hewlett-Packard Laboratories
info.summary:
George Forman works as a Computer Science Researcher in Data Mining and Machine Learning group, Hewlett-Packard Laboratories, and his\her h-index is 18, g-index is 35. His\Her interests are :
 Data Mining; Machine Learning; Parallel Algorithms; Sufficient Statistic; Text Mining;
